localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: The AdGate Media Self-Serve ad platform allows app teams of all sizes & budgets to run rewarded user acquisition campaigns. Drive motivated app users to complete meaningful & measurable KPIs such as install, register, subscribe, purchase, or complete level X.
nodes.title: AdGate Media: Self-Serve - Mobile app user acquisition fast, cheap, and easy
nodes.author: Sean Glickman

nodes.excerpt: A neat new way to organize your book collection, create reading lists with your favorite books and share them with friends, family and the rest of the world.
nodes.title: Personal Libraries by Read This Twice - Organize book collection, create and share reading lists

nodes.excerpt: Get 100 new paying customers in 100 days. That's it. That's the challenge.
nodes.title: 100 in 100 Challenge - Get 100 new paid users in 100 days

nodes.excerpt: The Keychron K12 is a versatile 60% compact wireless Mechanical keyboard that thrives in tight space & comes with a hot-swappable option. One of the few 60% keyboards that is eminently optimized for Mac users, while still being compatible with Windows.
nodes.title: Keychron K12 - A versatile 60% wireless mechanical keyboard
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: CryptOrchids is an NFT-based game where players must water their live CryptOrchid flowers exactly every 7 days. If a player misses their 3 hour weekly watering window, their digital flower dies, which prevents it from being sold.
nodes.title: CryptOrchids - An NFT-based game to keep digital flowers alive
nodes.author: Sam Bauch

nodes.excerpt: There are thousands of opportunities for entrepreneurs to make money on Amazon - as sellers, affiliates and producers. amalytics provides the data in an easy to use search engine format so you can find them in minutes.
nodes.title: amalytics - Search millions of Amazon niches in seconds

nodes.excerpt: A Notion system to keep track of tasks, ideas, info and events from your meetings.
nodes.title: Notion Meeting Notes - Organise your meeting notes in Notion
nodes.author: Harry Flarup

nodes.excerpt: oVice provides 2D virtual spaces for remote teams, event hosts, academic institutions, and community managers. Fostering both social and business communication, oVice helps you create genuine conversations and customize your virtual communication experience.
nodes.title: oVice Tour - 2D virtual spaces for social and business communication
nodes.author: Maya Ben Zid

nodes.excerpt: NAMA is a messaging app that turns everyday texting into a language practicing tool. Invite a friend and start chatting in any of our 100 languages or enter the practice mode to study the words and phrases from your conversations.
nodes.title: NAMA Chat - Practice any language while texting your friends
nodes.author: Sefunmi Osinaike

nodes.excerpt: With Slash, issue joint cards that you and your friends â€œco-own.â€ Spend a fraction of what you otherwise would on subscriptions by seamlessly splitting costs with friends.
nodes.title: Slash - Shared cards to split subscriptions, spend with friends

nodes.excerpt: With AI Retouch tool provided by Cutout.Pro, you can instantaneously remove unwanted things including people, objects, animals, scratches, defects, skin blemishes, freckles, wrinkles, and pimples from pictures. Say goodbye to the Clone Stamp Tool in Photoshop!
nodes.title: Cutout.Pro - Retouch photo online & magically remove unwanted elements
nodes.author: Jefferey

nodes.excerpt: Audiotorium is a free live audio app for location-based performances. Rediscover your neighborhood with this location-aware app and bring those block parties to life. Record stage performances in a new way and replay them as live with a new set of audiences.
nodes.title: Audiotorium - Hyper-local live audio performances
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Extract emails, phone no, address, website and a lot more from Instagram by hashtags, followers-following, media likers-commenters with GrowMeOrganic Instagram Scraper. Unlimited FREE trial & super easy to download and get started with.
nodes.title: GrowMeOrganic - Skyrocket your marketing with Instagram public data scraper
nodes.author: Anant Gupta

nodes.excerpt: Monitor key phrases added or removed to specific sites: - Look for regulatory mentions on government sites. - Detect mentions of your brand, jobs, or specific tech terms on competitors. Weâ€™ll scan entire sites and send you simple change reports each day.
nodes.title: Needle X3 - Get alerts when a monitored site adds specific phrases
nodes.author: pete bray

nodes.excerpt: Discoverable Json essentially flattens your JSON data (however nested) into valid javascript expressions. With absolute javascript paths, you can easily search for the sliver of data you care about. Or, remove the data that are not relevant to you.
nodes.title: JSON Manipulator - Discover and manipulate any JSON document
nodes.author: Lih Chen

nodes.title: Replit Ventures - A global, teen-friendly, Bitcoin based startup accelerator
nodes.author: Soren Rood

nodes.excerpt: Simplify your travel with Travi. Explore your travel destinations and bookmark your favorite things to do from activities to food options. Let us know your travel preferences and we will create a personalized itinerary to follow along day-by-day.
nodes.title: Travi - Easy travel planning with personalized itinerary
nodes.author: Joseph Lupo

nodes.excerpt: Use this app to prank your household using chromecast! It's a basic page you can add text and paste images into and then cast them onto the TV while your family members are watching.
nodes.title: Cast Pranker - Prank your family using chromecast
